001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.json;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.StringBuilderOut;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.TreeDumper;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.RenderSpec;
007
008import java.io.PrintStream;
009import java.util.ArrayDeque;
010import java.util.Deque;
011import java.util.Iterator;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Objects;
014
015/**
016 * Implementation of {@link TreeDumper} that dumps into the passed {@link PrintStream}
017 * the tree of a {@link Highlight.Structure#JSON JSON} logical structure
018 * in {@link Highlight.Target#HTML_STYLE HTML-Style} target format (HTML-CSS is coming soon).
019 */
020public class JsonHtmlDumper implements TreeDumper {
021
022    final PrintStream out;
023    final RenderSpec renderSpec;
024    final Deque<String> currentPath = new ArrayDeque<>();
025
026    int totalRowCount = 0;
027
028    public JsonHtmlDumper(PrintStream out, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
029        this.out = Objects.requireNonNull(out);
030        this.renderSpec = Objects.requireNonNull(renderSpec);
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public void acceptRoot(Node rootNode) {
035        PrintStream innerOut = StringBuilderOut.create();
036        JsonHtmlDumper innerDumper = new JsonHtmlDumper(innerOut, renderSpec);
037        rootNode.visit(innerDumper);
038        out.println(renderSpec.dumpOuterHtml(innerOut.toString(), Highlight.Structure.JSON));
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public void acceptNull() {
043        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
044            out.print(divRowStart());
045        }
046        out.print(renderSpec.highlightNullHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON));
047        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
048            out.print(divRowEnd());
049        }
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public void acceptScalar(ScalarNode scalarNode) {
054        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
055            out.print(divRowStart());
056        }
057        out.print(doubleQuotes());
058        out.print(renderSpec.highlightValueHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, scalarNode.text()));
059        out.print(doubleQuotes());
060        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
061            out.print(divRowEnd());
062        }
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public void acceptSequence(SequenceNode sequenceNode) {
067        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
068            out.print(divRowStart());
069        }
070        out.print(openSquareBracket());
071        int count = 0;
072        Iterator<Node> itNode = sequenceNode.sequenceItems().iterator();
073        while (itNode.hasNext()) {
074            if (count > 0) {
075                out.print(comma());
076            }
077            count++;
078            currentPath.addLast(String.format("[%d]", count));
079            out.println(divRowEnd());
080            out.print(divRowStart() + indent());
081            itNode.next().visit(this);
082            currentPath.removeLast();
083        }
084        if (count > 0) {
085            out.println(divRowEnd());
086            out.print(divRowStart() + indent());
087        }
088        out.print(closedSquareBracket());
089        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
090            out.print(divRowEnd());
091        }
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public void acceptMappings(MappingsNode mappingsNode) {
096        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
097            out.print(divRowStart());
098        }
099        out.print(openFigureBracket());
100        int count = 0;
101        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Node>> itEntry = mappingsNode.mappingsItems().iterator();
102        while (itEntry.hasNext()) {
103            Map.Entry<String, Node> entry = itEntry.next();
104            if (count > 0) {
105                out.print(comma());
106            }
107            count++;
108            currentPath.addLast(String.format("(%s)", entry.getKey()));
109            out.println(divRowEnd());
110            out.print(divRowStart() + indent());
111            out.print(doubleQuotes());
112            out.print(renderSpec.highlightKeyHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, entry.getKey()));
113            out.print(doubleQuotes());
114            out.print(colonSpace());
115            entry.getValue().visit(this);
116            currentPath.removeLast();
117        }
118        if (count > 0) {
119            out.println(divRowEnd());
120            out.print(divRowStart() + indent());
121        }
122        out.print(closedFigureBracket());
123        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
124            out.print(divRowEnd());
125        }
126    }
127
128    private String divRowStart() {
129        return String.format("""
130            <div class="json-row json-row-%d" style="white-space: pre">""",
131            totalRowCount++
132        );
133    }
134
135    private String divRowEnd() {
136        return "</div>";
137    }
138
139    private String indent() {
140        return "  ".repeat(currentPath.size());
141    }
142
143    private String comma() {
144        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, ',');
145    }
146
147    private String colonSpace() {
148        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, ": ");
149    }
150
151    private String doubleQuotes() {
152        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '"');
153    }
154
155    private String openSquareBracket() {
156        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '[');
157    }
158
159    private String closedSquareBracket() {
160        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, ']');
161    }
162
163    private String openFigureBracket() {
164        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '{');
165    }
166
167    private String closedFigureBracket() {
168        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '}');
169    }
170}
